contract_details.contract_period: From date of completion approximately 1/1/83 through 12/31/83 with January 1 becoming the annual anniversary date
contract_details.cancellation_privileges: On any January 1 anniversary date upon 60 days notice from agency without penalty
contract_details.copy_changes: If this bulletin is to be completely painted there will be 3 complete paintings, including the initial, annually, or if this bulletin is to be partially posted there will be 6 postings of posted portion and 3 paintings of painted portion, including the initial, annually, or if this bulletin is to be completely posted, there will be 6 postings, including the initial, annually.
contract_details.special_instructions: Plant will install holophane by 2/1/83. Also 5x17 extension.
